## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/bitcodeabbrev">BitCodeAbbrev</a> - This class represents an abbreviation record.

An abbreviation allows a complex record that has redundancy to be stored in a specialized format instead of the fully-general, fully-vbr, format.

Definition at line 103 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitstream/bitcodes-h">BitCodes.h</a>.
